title: Are Gummi Bears Made with Car Wax?
subtitle: Carnauba wax is used to add an attractive sheen to everything from cars to candy -- including fruit-flavored snacks such as Gummi Bears.
author: Stephanie Larsen
vclaim: The popular Gummi Bears (and similar fruit-flavored candies) are made with carnauba wax, the same ingredient that is found in car polish.
